vlive.korean: 일이 귀찮은데 기분이 안 좋다고? You don't feel good, because work is annoying? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 퉤디깜짝방문🌙
vlive.english: You don't feel good, because work is annoying?

vlive.korean: 세수하는 것도 귀찮은데 언제 또 솜에다가 물 묻혀서 닦고 이런... It's tiring to wash my face. I'm too tired to put remover on cotton balls... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 최최강한테 물어봐
vlive.english: It's tiring to wash my face. I'm too tired to put remover on cotton balls...

vlive.korean: 정말 귀찮은데도 불구하고 도와줬어요. Although it was tedious, they helped us out. 듣기 View video B.A.P : Happy halloween babys
vlive.english: Although it was tedious, they helped us out.

vlive.korean: 근데 귀찮은데 기승전 나는 좋아요. It's annoying, but I like the beginning. 듣기 View video Dispatch : "뉴이스트W, 알아두면 쓸데있는 T.M.I 타임"...#2018.07.15 Romantic Sunday Highlight (NU`EST W)
vlive.english: It's annoying, but I like the beginning.

vlive.korean: 이따 봐요. - 지금 귀찮은데. Let's watch later. - I'm tired right now. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Underdog - 언더독 '자리깔고 드러눕기'
vlive.english: Let's watch later. - I'm tired right now.

examples.korean: George told me to do the laundry. It's the devil and all. 발음듣기 조지는 나보고 빨래를 하라고 했다. 그것 참 귀찮은데. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: George told me to do the laundry. It's the devil and all. 발음

examples.korean: He rushed into the room without troubling to knock. 발음듣기 그는 귀찮게 노크 같은 건 하지 않고 방 안으로 뛰어 들어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He rushed into the room without troubling to knock. 발음

examples.korean: It’s too much of a fag to go out. 발음듣기 외출하는 건 너무 귀찮아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s too much of a fag to go out. 발음

examples.korean: I didn’t like to disturb you. 발음듣기 당신을 귀찮게 하고 싶지 않았어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I didn’t like to disturb you. 발음

examples.korean: I found the restrictions irksome. 발음듣기 나는 그 규제들이 귀찮았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I found the restrictions irksome. 발음
